summary: Improves the Heavy Armor perk tree so it makes a bit more sense.
descriptionHtml:
[font=verdana]Heavy Armor\'s perk tree mixed its defense and utility perks together and required some odd prerequisites. This is a small change to that.
Also available on the [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=77272635]Steam Workshop[/url].

[list][*]Fists of Steel\'s requirement was dropped to 20 to make it available earlier for unarmed builds, and those who do not wish to use unarmed no longer have to spend a perk on it to unlock anything else.

[*]Cushioned\'s requirement dropped to 30 to get it out of the way sooner. Its effect was changed from -50% fall damage to -95% fall damage. You\'ll still need Ethereal Visage to jump off a mountain, but Cushioned should at least be useful now.

[*]Tower of Strength was moved to the other side of the tree (between Cushioned and Conditioning) and I\'ve included a [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11887/]bugfix[/url] so it actually does something. It now correctly gives you a 50% chance to ignore stagger. I\'ve also included a fix for Force Without Effort so that it drops stagger chance and stacks with Tower of Strength.

[*]Matching Set was corrected to give a 25% bonus as it reports (it was erroneously giving 20%) and now works with ebony armor sets as well. It also no longer requires a helmet.

[*]Reflect Blows now requires a heavy armor chest piece and no light armor. Cushioned requires heavy armor boots and no light armor. Well Fitted no longer requires a helmet.[/list]


[color=cyan]Light Armor Tree[/color]
A small optional pack for Light Armor now also exists. It doesn\'t actually touch the tree structure itself (so it\'s compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19867]Ridin\' Dirty[/url], for example), instead just slightly modifying a few of the perks to better match how I\'ve set up their Heavy Armor counterparts.
[list][*]Matching Set was corrected to give a 25% bonus as it reports (it was erroneously giving 20%). It also no longer requires a helmet.
[*]Deft Movement now requires a light armor chest piece and no heavy armor. Wind Walker requires light armor boots and no heavy armor. Custom Fit no longer requires a helmet.[/list]
[/font]
author: Kevin Kidder
